name: Required provisions and benefits
text:
Notwithstanding any provision of law to the contrary, each policy, contract, plan, or agreement issued in the State after January 1, 1995, by health maintenance organizations pursuant to this chapter, shall include benefits provided in sections 431:10-212, 431:10A-115, 431:10A-115.5, 431:10A-116, 431:10A-116.5, 431:10A-116.6, 431:10A-119, 431:10A-120, and 431:10A-121, and chapter 431M. [L 1995, c 179, pt of §1; am L 1999, c 77, §8 and c 86, §4; am L 2000, c 243, §4]
Attorney General Opinions
  No reference was made to new section added to article 10A of chapter 431 [§431:10A-601], by §4 of reciprocal beneficiaries act [L 1997, c 383]; thus, §431:10A-601 did not apply to health maintenance organizations.  Att. Gen. Op. 97-5.
